DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect suprascapular nerve block guide ultrasound combine home exercise compare placebo . Pain intensity , function , pressure pain threshold goniometry design assessed patient .
DOC.detailed_description: The trial carry Institute Physical Medicine Rehabilitation University São Paulo since June 2013 . The investigator include patient clinical diagnosis supraspinatus tendinitis base Lateral Jobe Test . The patient randomize two arm : Active ( 2 % 5ml lidocaine suprascapular nerve block home exercise ) placebo control ( saline solution nerve block home exercise ) . The randomization perform block 4 6 . The investigator , raters , MD make procedure patient blind treatment . 4 visit perform . Screening initial evaluation visit , procedure visit , follow 1 week intervention follow 12 week intervention . The sample size estimate 54 arm .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis supraspinatus tendonitis , base Jobe 's lateral test ; Pain longer 1 month prior screen visit ; BMI 20 30 kg/m² ; VAS 4 high screening visit ; Ability understand questionaires instruction home exercise ; Signed Informed Consent Form ; History : 1 . Shoulder surgery ; 2 . Athletic activity ; 3 . Severe shoulder arthrosis ; 4 . Diagnosis total rupture supraspinatus tendon 5 . Autoimmune disease ; 6 . Fracture humerus , acromion clavicle 7 . Luxation subluxation shoulder . 8 . Diseases cause spasticity , stroke spinal cord injury ; 9 . Systemic alteration lead peripheral neuropathy ; 10 . Uncontrolled Diabetes thyroidopathy ; 11 . Diagnosis cervical spinal cord injury result motor alteration ; 12 . Allergy hypersensibility local systemic anaesthetic ; 13 . Coagulopathy ; 14 . Fibromyalgia accord 1990 American School Rheumatology ; 15 . Uncontrolled psychiatric disease control psychiatric disease need two medicine ; 16 . Acute chronic renal failure ; 17 . Pulmonary disease present hypoxemia Gold IV Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease pulmonary fibrosis . 18 . Arrhythmia ( except isolate supraventricular extrasystole ) , coronary failure functional class 2 high heart failure Pregnancy ; Use oral subcutaneous anticoagulation agent ; Patients fail comply propose treatment .
